TextView.android:text: Welcome to my first app. My name is Anar. I've found the Android Studio application fun and useful. I would like to develop an app that helps people solve procrastination. I plan to make the app simple but surely useful. It will probably be a timer app coupled with a to-do-list. When one needs to accomplish the task, the timer would start running until that task it done. Also, an addition of a calendar would help the app more complete as well. I am looking forward to developing this app as I learn more in the days and weeks ahead.
